meta.dc:title: 116 S 1380 ENR: To amend the Federal Rules of Criminal Procedure ...

longTitle.officialTitle: To amend the Federal Rules of Criminal Procedure ...

main.enactingFormula: Be it enacted by the Senate and ..,

section.heading: Short title.
section.content: This Act may be cited as the “Due Process Protections Act ”.

section.heading: Reminder of prosecutorial obligations.
section.chapeau: Rule 5 of the Federal Rules of Criminal Procedure is amended—
